body:
Soz for spam, but anyways, 

Is it legal to set a macro to toggle sprint/shift? I know there's mods which do the same thing for you. 

I'm not using a macro like this fyi, nor have I
body_tagged:
Soz for spam, but anyways, 

Is it legal to set a macro to toggle sprint/shift? I know there's mods which do the same thing for you. 

I'm not using a macro like this fyi, nor have I
title: Would This Be Allowed?

replies.body:
No macros (I believe the macro mod is banned) although I still don't know the difference.

EDIT : refer to the rules section C point number10


  1. The mods listed below are strictly not allowed to use:
    1. Sorting inventory mods
    2. Fly mods
    3. Aimbots
    4. Toggle-crouch mods that allow crouching while using a Minecraft interface (inventories, menus, chat)
    5. Minimaps that reveals the positions of creatures, players or underground caves/tunnels
    6. Auto-swing mods
    7. Mods that assist in switching tools
    8. X-ray mods or texture packs
    9. Mods that enhance player visibility (enlarged name tags)
    10. Mods that enhance sprinting capabilities
replies.body_tagged:
No macros (I believe the macro mod is banned) although I still don't know the difference.

EDIT : refer to the rules section C point number10


  1. The mods listed below are strictly not allowed to use:
    1. Sorting inventory mods
    2. Fly mods
    3. Aimbots
    4. Toggle-crouch mods that allow crouching while using a Minecraft interface (inventories, menus, chat)
    5. Minimaps that reveals the positions of creatures, players or underground caves/tunnels
    6. Auto-swing mods
    7. Mods that assist in switching tools
    8. X-ray mods or texture packs
    9. Mods that enhance player visibility (enlarged name tags)
    10. Mods that enhance sprinting capabilities

replies.body: It is a mod that gives a player an advantage over another player so it is not allowed.
replies.body_tagged: It is a mod that gives a player an advantage over another player so it is not allowed.

replies.body: I'm pretty sure you can you a toggle-shift as long as you don't stay shifted while your inventory is open or anything, since you can basically do the same with vanilla settings. Toggle-sprint isn't allowed though.
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure you can you a toggle-shift as long as you don't stay shifted while your inventory is open or anything, since you can basically do the same with vanilla settings. Toggle-sprint isn't allowed though.

replies.body:
The rule varies on different servers. For example, this server allows gamma change in your Minecraft settings (since it is Vanilla Minecraft with no mods), while a server that vladthegreat100 plays on does not allow it.
Certain things are not allowed on certain servers. They each have their own unique set of rules.
replies.body_tagged:
The rule varies on different servers. For example, this server allows gamma change in your Minecraft settings (since it is Vanilla Minecraft with no mods), while a server that vladthegreat100 plays on does not allow it.
Certain things are not allowed on certain servers. They each have their own unique set of rules.

replies.body:
I'm sure most mods aren't allowed, since it's similar to "hacks". Well they are pretty much the same. 

I'm not sure why you would want a crouch mod anyhow, shifting normally isn't that hard :/

Anyhow just see what the staffs say

replies.body: That's called a keybind not a macro. Keybinds are allowed because all you're doing is modifying your controls.
